name: Approve Beneficiary
query:
SELECT
  name AS `Id`,
  certificate_no AS `Certificate No`,
  birth_date AS `Birth Date`,
  status AS `Status`,
  first_name AS `First Name`,
  last_name AS `Last Name`,
  mobile_no AS `Mobile No`,
  email_id AS `Email Id`,
  1 AS `Count`
FROM
  `tabBeneficiary`
WHERE
  status = 'Approve'
ORDER BY
  creation DESC;
